\documentclass[grado3]{LEMA-Tikz-IM}
\begin{document}
\begin{tikzpicture}
% \usetikzlibrary{positioning} % for relative note placement (right = of)

\tikzset{%
  node distance=0cm   % 0 distance between nodes so that edges coincide
}

% Style of "tarjeta" node
\tikzstyle{tarjeta}=[%
    , draw                 % draw rectangle edges     
    , text width = 1.4in     % min width     
    , minimum height = 2.1in % min height
    , align = center       % alignment
    , outer sep = 0cm      % 0 "personal space" for nodes
    , inner sep = 2ex      % 0 "personal space" for nodes
    , execute at begin node={\centering\let\raggedright\relax} % Prevent hyphenation and center
    % , text height=0.5cm    % vertical placement of text inside node
    % , text depth=0.0cm,    % vertical placement of text inside node (modes opposite dir)
]


\def\textoTarjetaA{$(7\times 2)\times 2$}
\def\textoTarjetaB{$6\times 7$}
\def\textoTarjetaC{$7\times 4$}
\def\textoTarjetaD{$8\times 3$}
\def\textoTarjetaE{$3\times 6 + 5\times 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaF{$(4\times 3)\times 2$}
\def\textoTarjetaG{$4\times (2\times 3)$}
\def\textoTarjetaH{$4\times 9$}
\def\textoTarjetaI{$(5\times 6)+(2\times 6)$}
\def\textoTarjetaJ{$2\times(2\times 9)$}
\def\textoTarjetaK{$8\times 6$}
\def\textoTarjetaL{$(5\times 4)+(2\times 4)$}


\node[tarjeta] (tarjetaA) {\textoTarjetaA};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaB) {\textoTarjetaB};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaB] (tarjetaC) {\textoTarjetaC};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaA] (tarjetaD) {\textoTarjetaD};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaD] (tarjetaE) {\textoTarjetaE};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaE] (tarjetaF) {\textoTarjetaF};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaD] (tarjetaG) {\textoTarjetaG};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaG] (tarjetaH) {\textoTarjetaH};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaH] (tarjetaI) {\textoTarjetaI};


\node[tarjeta, below = of tarjetaG] (tarjetaJ) {\textoTarjetaJ};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaJ] (tarjetaK) {\textoTarjetaK};
\node[tarjeta, right = of tarjetaK] (tarjetaL) {\textoTarjetaL};


\foreach \tarj in {A,...,L}{
  \node[above right, font=\scriptsize, align=left] at (tarjeta\tarj.south west){Expresiones diferentes,\\mismo rect√°ngulo};
  \node[below right] at (tarjeta\tarj.north west) {\tarj};
}


\end{tikzpicture}
\end{document}
